overview: They say that hell hath no fury like a woman scorned and revenge is a dish best served cold. But for these lesbian lovers, revenge is a dish that best served up sizzling hot! Revenge can be so sweet when the recipient doesn't even know its cumming. Watch these Sapphic lovers lick, fondle, and finger each other into a fucking frenzy before exacting sweet revenge in four sizzling hot scenes!
tagline: Sweet revenge is the best revenge!
title: Lesbian Revenge
